Translations.Text: Phir jab humara hukum aa phoncha hum ney uss basti ko zair-o-zabar ker diya upper ka hissa neechay ker diya aur unn per kankreelay pathar barsaye jo teh ba teh thay
Teray rab ki taraf say nishan daar thay aur woh inn zalimon say kuch door na thay

Aur hum ney madiyan walon ki taraf unn kay bhai shoaib ko bhej a uss ney kaha aey meri qom! Allah ki ibadat kero aur uss kay siwa tumhara koi mabood nahi aur tum naap tol mein bhi kami na kero mein to tumhen aasooda haal dekh raha hun aur mujhay tum per gherney walay din kay azab ka khof (bhi) hai
Aey meri qom! Naap tol insaf kay sath poori poori kero logon ko unn ki cheezen kum na do aur zamin main fasad aur kharabi na machao
Allah Taalaa ka halal kiya hua jo bach rahey tumharya liye boht hi behtar hai agar tum eman walay ho mein tum per kuch nigehban (aur darogha) nahi hun
Unhon ney jawab diya kay aey shoaib! Kiya teri salaat tujhay yehi hukum deti hai kay hum apney baap dadon kay maboodon ko chor den tu to bara hi ba waqar aur nek chalan aadmi hai

Kaha aey meri qom! Dekho to agar mein apney rab ki taraf say roshan daleel liye huye hon aur uss ney mujhay apney pass say behtareen rozi dey rakhi hai mera yeh irada bilkul nahi kay tumhara khilaf ker kay khud uss cheez ki taraf jhuk jaon jiss say tmhen rok raha hun meri irada to apni taqat bhar islaah kerney ka hi hai. Meri tofiq Allah hi ki madad say hai ussi per mera bharosa hai aur ussi ki taraf mein rujoo kerta hun
